content: lion brand pattern # 40443 *cff-furrylittlebag pdf* published in crochet fantasy crochet magazine interweave knits knit 1 learn to crochet digest simply creative crochet vogue knitting skill level easy level 2 a 520-202 incredible yarn blue shades 1 ball b 320-109 fun fur yarn sapphire 1 ball crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm sewing needle and thread to match front and back are worked with 1 strand each a and b held together handles are worked with 1 strand of a only *free registration at site required to access patterns *
